# Introduction 

+ Data source: This embryonic stem cell (ESC) data was combined from 7 different experiements with 5 different protocols. This data contains cells from both human and mouse which poses extra challenges to the normalisation. There are cells across 10 different cell types in the combined data.

# Biological novelty

In addition to normalising across 7 scRNA-Seq datasets, the normalisation was performed across 2 different species (human and mouse). This demonstrated `scMerge`'s capabilities in cross-species normalisation.
